name: Robot Fight Ring VS Heros
description:
Welcome to "Robot Fight ring VS heroes"

Explore the world of superhero robots with breathtaking action-packed adventure of real transform robot and wrestling ring fight.

Ths game is a robot ring wrestling game where you will play the role of ring fighter.

"Robot Fight ring VS heroes" brings to you a Robot War fighting game where you as a Superhero Robot or a transforming Steel have to fight with bots of enemies who are trying to spread evilness in the ring. 


Features:


*3D Game.
*Unimaginable robot powers.
*Beautiful scenes and levels.
